segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water pouring out like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh wow, her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a stool that's wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar in the open cabinet, grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, her hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be sneaking cookies behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful through the window, such a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip over; it looks ready to go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big mess if no one stops it soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
